Summary: Random but Consistant Very Intense Flashing Lights
divs: Sighting DetailsFrom my Kitchen Sliding Glass Window I noticed a Very Intense Light Pulsing low over the horizon. It Pulsed 4 times and was whitish in color. I ran to the bedroom to show my Girlfriend. She came to the Bedroom Sliding Glass Window. There was no sign for a few moments, maybe 20 seconds. The Pulsing began again. It pulsed 4 times then went dark, i will refer to the dark period as a pause. It pulsed again 3 times then a pause. It pulsed 2 times then a pause. Then it pulsed 12 times changing to a bluish lavender color. At this point the pulsing stopped. I have never seen anything such as this in my life. I have lived here in the antelope valley near Plant 42 for many years and have never seen such a display. I know my aircraft being the child of an AF B-52 Pilot and I was scared so was my Girlfriend...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Quartz Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
